Author: Murtaza N (2022)
Qualifications: BioID experiment|The scores are relative biotinylation enrichment scores (calculated as a percentage of the abundance fold change of the highest biotinylated prey protein)|The statistical cut-offs for the prey proteins are based on adjusted t-test p-value and significance B scores of less than 0.05, by comparing average abundances of prey proteins between the Bait-BioID samples and the luciferase-BioID control
